description: Not able to make this program do anything useful.
There's a fair amount of capability here. I wish it was a lot more intuitive, but I can use this app.
summary: Kinda slick for a free app

description: Wanted to use it for some non-financial (engineering) time-series data (CSV format) but can't find the "example" data file to see what the structure of the data is required. Kept getting "invalid data" error messages as my voltage measurements are not what the program expected. Looks interesting though, just apparently not useful for generic data charting and analysis. A help file would be ... helpful.

In theory I can set up my portfolio, open it & see what all of my stocks,currency, oil, gold & bitcoin prices etc. are doing today in a single click.

It's technical & depends on the 3rd parties who are willing to give up data, preferably without a delay, signup, or fee. Certainly worth a try.
summary: Great for those really into shares/exch. rates/gold etc

description:
WEnt through the manual and tried to load data with the format specified in the example. I even copied the example to see if I was making a mistake.
Either way it din't work. Perhaps this software is too old and useless now.

I have seen this program working on another sytsem and it seems to offer all the basics for charting and technical analysis. Unfortunately it won 't launch on my 21.04 system. I'm not sure what the problem is. I'd give it a higher rating if I could get it running.
I am using this charting app since 2015 and am very satisfied. Most used technical indicators are included and bugs are dealt with swiftly.
summary: Super App, recommended for starting investors

description: I like its easy of use while studying charts. just type symbol and it will download it ,then just open it to study. Good for learning as you can use all the given indicators. No need for an account. But definately not for side by side trading.
summary: Not for side by side trading, only recommended for studying charts

description:
Installed on Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS without any issues, but the app doesn't launch when the icon is clicked.

Per the website:

"News
2023-07-08: Project End Of Life
Char Geany has reached EOL and is now retired. Thanks to everyone who used and supported the project by any means"

If You invest the time to search the symbols for the stocks and shares, this program
gives You fine graphics, easy chart-updates and detailed analystics.

Il ne se lance pas sur Ubunto 22.10, car il ne veut pas reconnaître Wayland.
Installer qt5 ne change rien, hélas.

Message d'erreur suivant :
Got keys from plugin meta data ("xcb")
QFactoryLoader::QFactoryLoader() checking directory path "/snap/chartgeany/15/opt/chartgeany/platforms" ...
qt.qpa.plugin: Could not find the Qt platform plugin "wayland-egl" in ""
This application failed to start because no Qt platform plugin could be initialized. Reinstalling the application may fix this problem.

Available platform plugins are: dxcb, eglfs, linuxfb, minimal, minimalegl, offscreen, vnc, xcb.

Abandon (core dumped)
Sur ubuntu 22.04 il ne se lance pas...... Améliorez sa tout de suite Merci !
